Description: Plain weave fragment with brocading; on the right side of the textile a fragment of plain weave has been applied and sewn on the back to fill a hole, back-running stitches and other sewing; one band of brocading on the left part of the textile, decorated with triangular motifs in brown, yellow and pink, and separated by zig-zags in yellow and green; at the lower part of the band are 3 lines of undyed weft brocading; warp-undyed linen (S/12), weft-undyed linen (S/10), weft brocading in undyed linen (S/grouped by 4) and pink, yellow, brown and green wool (S/paired); one simple selvedge with other edges cut or ragged
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
